function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Internal layout design impacting movement patterns and proximity of people","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Rethinking internal layout to minimize close contact and aerosol transmission","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM) for simulating movement patterns","People":"Residents in multi-storey apartment buildings","Owner":"Architects and building designers"},{"Description":"Narrow corridors and bottleneck positioning of doors","Impact":"Forced close proximity and potential entry into another person's aerosol cone","Mitigation":"Redesigning widths and positioning of corridors and doors to minimize close contact","Technologies":"Dynamic airflow modeling for optimizing ventilation","People":"Residents in multi-storey apartment buildings","Owner":"Building developers and planners"},{"Description":"Lack of ventilation in corridor spaces","Impact":"Restriction of airflow contributing to the spread of COVID-like diseases","Mitigation":"Reconsidering external communication corridors with improved ventilation solutions","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems and air purifiers","People":"Residents in multi-storey apartment buildings","Owner":"Building developers and planners"}]}
